summary: Just couple of lore male followers
descriptionHtml:
Pack of my male followers. All of them are Essentual and autolevel from 5 to 100 with player
Ashtar - orc at Riverwood\' inn 
skills: 2handed heavy armor archery (1handed+shield mastery add in high levels)
Warning - DONT use Ashtar with my female follower named Arshfa - they have same spawn point and that can cause u lags or CTD
Xander - nord at Falkreath\' inn
skills: 1handed+shield heavy armor archery
Warning - DONT use Xander with my female follower named Sana - they have same spawn point and that can cause u lags or CTD
Recommended: 
Better males http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488
Ultimate Followers Overhaul (a.k.a. UFO) http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037
For all credits and other info go here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29055
author: Vinsun
